name: guppe
description: Decentralized social groups with ActivityPub, NodeJS, Express, Vue, and Mongodb

scripts.publish: docker tag datatitian/guppe:latest datatitian/guppe:$npm_package_version && docker push datatitian/guppe:latest && docker push datatitian/guppe:$npm_package_version
scripts.build-pub: npm run build && npm run publish

author: Will Murphy
